Both films are sure to keep you on the edge of your seat!

It seems there might have been a mix-up with the year, as none of the movies you've listed were released in 1947. However, let me recommend two intriguing films from your list that align well with the adventure genre and could potentially be enjoyable:

1. 'Hook': A captivating tale about an adult Peter Pan who must return to Neverland to reclaim his youthful spirit and save his children. Starring Robin Williams as Peter Pan, this movie is sure to offer a thrilling adventure!
2. 'E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial': A heartwarming story of a friendship between a young boy and an alien stranded on Earth. With remarkable performances by Henry Thomas and Dee Wallace, this classic adventure is definitely worth checking out!
